divs: Sighting DetailsI was again trying out my new night vision monocular and had seen sattelites as well as a line of 3 white star like objects very high amoungst the stars moving in a straight line across the night sky until they went out of view.I was resting my eyes immediatly after observing the 3 lights when i saw what i beleive to be a triangular shaped object very low at maybe 1000 feet or less illuminated by 3 orange very bright lights. The object was moving from West to East at a steady speed fast but not that fast that i did not have time to observe it for about 25 seconds before it went out of sight.The object was completely silent and just seemed to glide across the night sky.10 minutes earlier i was observing a police helicopter in the same area and was extremly noisy and appeared to be at simialr height to the UFO i had observed, so i know that this UFO was not commercial or private air traffic from the eerie silence as it approached and departed the area.I am really annoyed that i did not have my camcorder to hand at the time because this is twice now in 2 days that i have seen strange silent objects pass and i just hope i get another opportunity to witness these objects again but i will be prepared.
